Doc: A type defining an early termination provision for a swap. This early termination is at fair value, i.e. on termination the fair value of the product must be settled between the parties.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining an early termination provision for a swap. This early termination is at fair value, i.e. on termination the fair value of the product must be settled between the parties.
 #/
record FpML5.reporting.EarlyTerminationProvision {
  # Period after trade date of the mandatory early termination date.
  mandatoryEarlyTerminationDateTenor : FpML5.reporting.Period?

  # A mandatory early termination provision to terminate the swap at fair value.
  mandatoryEarlyTermination : FpML5.reporting.MandatoryEarlyTermination?

  # Definition of the first early termination date and the frequency of the termination dates subsequent to that. American exercise is defined by having a frequency of one day.
  optionalEarlyTerminationParameters : FpML5.reporting.ExercisePeriod?

  # An option for either or both parties to terminate the swap at fair value.
  optionalEarlyTermination : FpML5.reporting.OptionalEarlyTermination?

  id : string?

}

mandatoryEarlyTerminationDateTenor.Doc: Period after trade date of the mandatory early termination date.
mandatoryEarlyTerminationDateTenor.Name: mandatoryEarlyTerminationDateTenor

mandatoryEarlyTermination.Doc: A mandatory early termination provision to terminate the swap at fair value.
mandatoryEarlyTermination.Name: mandatoryEarlyTermination

optionalEarlyTerminationParameters.Doc: Definition of the first early termination date and the frequency of the termination dates subsequent to that. American exercise is defined by having a frequency of one day.
optionalEarlyTerminationParameters.Name: optionalEarlyTerminationParameters

optionalEarlyTermination.Doc: An option for either or both parties to terminate the swap at fair value.
optionalEarlyTermination.Name: optionalEarlyTermination
